languages.text: "Ксавьера не волновало, что я был увечным уродом — от меня ему требовалось мое колдовство. Я решил, что буду полезнее, если начну снова напоминать человека". {n}Хейнрикс подносит руку к лицу.{/n} "Дольше всего я восстанавливал глазное яблоко. Даже нервные связи не требовали таких долгих усилий. Ушло много лет на то, чтобы избавиться от зрительных аберраций и начать видеть так же хорошо, как в детстве".

traits.locale_text: "Ксавьера не волновало, что я был увечным уродом — от меня ему требовалось мое колдовство. Я решил, что буду полезнее, если начну снова напоминать человека". {n}Хейнрикс подносит руку к лицу.{/n} "Дольше всего я восстанавливал глазное яблоко. Даже нервные связи не требовали таких долгих усилий. Ушло много лет на то, чтобы избавиться от зрительных аберраций и начать видеть так же хорошо, как в детстве".

languages.text: "Xavier didn't care that I was a maimed freak — he needed me for my sorcery, nothing more. But I decided I would be more useful if I could start to look more like a human again." {n}Heinrix brings his hand to his face.{/n} "Repairing my eyeball took the longest. Even the nerve connections took less effort. Years went by before I managed to eliminate all the visual aberrations and I could see as well as I had when I was a child."
languages.original_text: "Ксавьера не волновало, что я был увечным уродом — от меня ему требовалось мое колдовство. Я решил, что буду полезнее, если начну снова напоминать человека". {n}Хейнрикс подносит руку к лицу.{/n} "Дольше всего я восстанавливал глазное яблоко. Даже нервные связи не требовали таких долгих усилий. Ушло много лет на то, чтобы избавиться от зрительных аберраций и начать видеть так же хорошо, как в детстве".

traits.locale_text: "Xavier didn't care that I was a maimed freak — he needed me for my sorcery, nothing more. But I decided I would be more useful if I could start to look more like a human again." {n}Heinrix brings his hand to his face.{/n} "Repairing my eyeball took the longest. Even the nerve connections took less effort. Years went by before I managed to eliminate all the visual aberrations and I could see as well as I had when I was a child."

"Xavier didn't care that I was a maimed freak — he needed me for my sorcery, nothing more. But I decided I would be more useful if I could start to look more like a human again." {n}Heinrix brings his hand to his face.{/n} "Repairing my eyeball took the longest. Even the nerve connections took less effort. Years went by before I managed to eliminate all the visual aberrations and I could see as well as I had when I was a child."

Even the nerve connections took less effort. Years went by before I managed to eliminate all the visual aberrations and I could see as well as I had when I was a child."

"Xavier didn't care that I was a maimed freak — he needed me for my sorcery, nothing more. But I decided I would be more useful if I could start to look more like a human again." {n}Heinrix brings his hand to his face.{/n} "Repairing my eyeball took the longest. Even the nerve connections took less effort. Years went by before I managed to eliminate all the visual aberrations and I could see as well as I had when I was a child."

languages.text: “希维尔并不在乎我是不是个残缺不全的怪胎。他需要我的巫术力量，仅此而已。但那个时候，我便在想，如果我能重新变得更像人类的话，或许就能派上更大用场。”{n}海因里希摸了摸自己的脸。{/n}“修复眼球花的时间最久，就连重建神经连接也没那么费劲。过了很多年之后，我才彻底消除了所有的视觉畸变，恢复了孩提时期的视力。”
languages.original_text: "Xavier didn't care that I was a maimed freak — he needed me for my sorcery, nothing more. But I decided I would be more useful if I could start to look more like a human again." {n}Heinrix brings his hand to his face.{/n} "Repairing my eyeball took the longest. Even the nerve connections took less effort. Years went by before I managed to eliminate all the visual aberrations and I could see as well as I had when I was a child."

traits.locale_text: “希维尔并不在乎我是不是个残缺不全的怪胎。他需要我的巫术力量，仅此而已。但那个时候，我便在想，如果我能重新变得更像人类的话，或许就能派上更大用场。”{n}海因里希摸了摸自己的脸。{/n}“修复眼球花的时间最久，就连重建神经连接也没那么费劲。过了很多年之后，我才彻底消除了所有的视觉畸变，恢复了曾经的视力。”

languages.text: «A Xavier le daba igual que fuese un espantajo mutilado. Me necesitaba por mi hechicería y punto. Pero yo decidí que sería más útil tener un aspecto más humano otra vez». {n}Heinrix se lleva la mano a la cara.{/n} «Lo más costoso fue arreglarme el ojo. Hasta las conexiones nerviosas fueron menos trabajo. Pasaron años hasta que puede eliminar todas las deformidades visuales y ver tan bien como había visto cuando era un niño».
languages.original_text: "Xavier didn't care that I was a maimed freak — he needed me for my sorcery, nothing more. But I decided I would be more useful if I could start to look more like a human again." {n}Heinrix brings his hand to his face.{/n} "Repairing my eyeball took the longest. Even the nerve connections took less effort. Years went by before I managed to eliminate all the visual aberrations and I could see as well as I had when I was a child."

traits.locale_text: «A Xavier le daba igual que fuese un espantajo mutilado. Me necesitaba por mi hechicería y punto. Pero yo decidí que sería más útil tener un aspecto más humano otra vez». {n}Heinrix se lleva la mano a la cara.{/n} «Lo más costoso fue arreglarme el ojo. Hasta las conexiones nerviosas fueron menos trabajo. Pasaron años hasta que puede eliminar todas las deformidades visuales y ver tan bien como había visto cuando era un niño».

languages.text: 「ザビエルは、俺が身体に障害を持っていることなど気にも留めなかった…彼が必要としたのは、俺の魔術だけなのだ。だが、俺は己が人間に近い姿に戻れたら、もっと彼の役に立つと思ったんだ」{n}ハインリックスは顔に手をやる。{/n}「眼球の修復に一番時間がかかった。神経の接続でさえ、それほど手間はかからなかった。何年か経って、視覚の異常がなくなり、子供の頃と同じように見えるようになった」
languages.original_text: "Xavier didn't care that I was a maimed freak — he needed me for my sorcery, nothing more. But I decided I would be more useful if I could start to look more like a human again." {n}Heinrix brings his hand to his face.{/n} "Repairing my eyeball took the longest. Even the nerve connections took less effort. Years went by before I managed to eliminate all the visual aberrations and I could see as well as I had when I was a child."

traits.locale_text: 「ザビエルは、俺が身体に障害を持っていることなど気にも留めなかった…彼が必要としたのは、俺の魔術だけなのだ。だが、俺は己が人間に近い姿に戻れたら、もっと彼の役に立つと思ったんだ」{n}ハインリックスは顔に手をやる。{/n}「眼球の修復に一番時間がかかった。神経の接続でさえ、それほど手間はかからなかった。何年か経って、視覚の異常がなくなり、子供の頃と同じように見えるようになった」

languages.text: « Je ressemblais à une bête de foire mutilée, mais Xavier s'en moquait. Tout ce qui l'intéressait, c'était ma sorcellerie. J'ai tout de même décidé que je pourrais me rendre plus utile en retrouvant une apparence humaine. C'est mon globe oculaire qui a mis le plus de temps à se régénérer, {n}dit-il en portant une main à son visage.{/n} Contrairement à ce que l'on pourrait croire, j'ai eu bien moins de mal à réparer les connexions nerveuses. Il m'a fallu des années pour éliminer toute la pollution visuelle résiduelle et recouvrer complètement la vue. »
languages.original_text: "Xavier didn't care that I was a maimed freak — he needed me for my sorcery, nothing more. But I decided I would be more useful if I could start to look more like a human again." {n}Heinrix brings his hand to his face.{/n} "Repairing my eyeball took the longest. Even the nerve connections took less effort. Years went by before I managed to eliminate all the visual aberrations and I could see as well as I had when I was a child."

traits.locale_text: « Je ressemblais à une bête de foire mutilée, mais Xavier s'en moquait. Tout ce qui l'intéressait, c'était ma sorcellerie. J'ai tout de même décidé que je pourrais me rendre plus utile en retrouvant une apparence humaine. C'est mon globe oculaire qui a mis le plus de temps à se régénérer, {n}dit-il en portant une main à son visage.{/n} Contrairement à ce que l'on pourrait croire, j'ai eu bien moins de mal à réparer les connexions nerveuses. Il m'a fallu des années pour éliminer toute la pollution visuelle résiduelle et recouvrer complètement la vue. »

languages.text: "Xavier war es völlig egal, dass ich ein verstümmelter Freak war – er brauchte mich für meine Zauberei, mehr nicht. Aber ich entschied, dass ich nützlicher wäre, wenn ich wieder mehr wie ein Mensch aussehen würde." {n}Heinrix bewegt seine Hand vors Gesicht.{/n} "Meine Auge zu reparieren hat am längsten gedauert. Selbst die Nervenverbindungen bedurften weniger Anstrengung. Es dauerte Jahre, bis ich alle Sehfehler ausmerzen und wieder so gut sehen konnte wie als Kind."
languages.original_text: "Xavier didn't care that I was a maimed freak — he needed me for my sorcery, nothing more. But I decided I would be more useful if I could start to look more like a human again." {n}Heinrix brings his hand to his face.{/n} "Repairing my eyeball took the longest. Even the nerve connections took less effort. Years went by before I managed to eliminate all the visual aberrations and I could see as well as I had when I was a child."

traits.locale_text: "Xavier war es völlig egal, dass ich ein verstümmelter Freak war – er brauchte mich für meine Zauberei, mehr nicht. Aber ich entschied, dass ich nützlicher wäre, wenn ich wieder mehr wie ein Mensch aussehen würde." {n}Heinrix bewegt seine Hand vors Gesicht.{/n} "Meine Auge zu reparieren hat am längsten gedauert. Selbst die Nervenverbindungen bedurften weniger Anstrengung. Es dauerte Jahre, bis ich alle Sehfehler ausmerzen und wieder so gut sehen konnte wie als Kind."

languages.text: "Xavier, benim sakat bir ucube olmamı umursamadı. Yalnızca sahirliğime ihtiyacı vardı, başka bir şeye değil. Ancak ben, yeniden insana benzemeye başlarsam daha çok işe yarayacağıma karar verdim." {n}Heinrix, elini yüzüne getiriyor.{/n} "Göz yuvarımı onarmak, en uzun süren oldu. Sinirlerimi bağlamam bile daha az uğraş gerektirdi. Tüm görsel sapkıları ortadan kaldırarak küçük bir çocukken gördüğüm kadar iyi görebilmeyi başarmam yıllarımı aldı."
languages.original_text: "Xavier didn't care that I was a maimed freak — he needed me for my sorcery, nothing more. But I decided I would be more useful if I could start to look more like a human again." {n}Heinrix brings his hand to his face.{/n} "Repairing my eyeball took the longest. Even the nerve connections took less effort. Years went by before I managed to eliminate all the visual aberrations and I could see as well as I had when I was a child."
